info.title: KidAble Backend API
info.description: Parent/therapist endpoints for KidAble app (Supabase-compatible monolith).

tags.name: Admin Client Journal
tags.description: View client journal entries logged by parents

tags.name: Admin Client Mood
tags.description: View client mood entries logged by parents

tags.name: Admin Parents
tags.description: Parent directory - search and view parents

tags.name: Admin Resource Library
tags.description: Resource library management - browse, create, edit resources

tags.name: Admin Strategy Library
tags.description: Strategy library management - browse, create, edit strategies

tags.name: Resources
tags.description: Resources available to the client (global + assigned)

put.summary: Update a parent and/or their relationship to the client

delete.summary: Remove a parent from a client

post.description:
Path params:
- clientId (uuid, required)
Body:
- parentId (uuid, optional)
- entryDate (date, optional, defaults to today)
- mood (required)
- zone (optional)
- energyLevel (optional)
- emoji (optional)
- notes (optional)

Path params:
- clientId (uuid, required)
Body:
- parentId (uuid, required)
- entryDate (date, optional, defaults to today)
- entryTime (time, optional)
- zone (string, required)
- energyGivers, energyDrainers, relaxingActivity, additionalNotes (optional)
- tags (array of strings)
Append a completion entry for a homework assignment.

Request body:
- accessCode (string, required)
Responses:
- 200 with client/parent data
- 401 if code is invalid/inactive

get.description: List all therapists with optional status and search filters

post.description: Create a new therapist. Optionally generates an access code.

get.description: Browse all strategies. Filter by type, global flag, or search term.

post.description: Add a new strategy to the library

get.description: Returns all staff access codes with optional filtering

post.summary: Create a new staff access code
post.description: Generates a new access code for the specified user

get.description: Browse all resources. Filter by type, category, global flag, or search term.

post.description: Add a new resource to the library

get.summary: List access codes for a parent

post.summary: Create a new access code for a parent
post.description: Generates a code when none is provided; validates uniqueness when provided.

get.description: Filter by status, search term, or therapy type. Use mine=true to list only clients assigned to current therapist. Admins see all by default.

get.summary: List therapists assigned to a client

post.summary: Assign a therapist to a client

get.summary: List parents/caregivers linked to a client

post.summary: Add a parent to a client
post.description: If parentId is provided, links existing parent. Otherwise creates a new parent.

delete.description: Sets the therapist status to inactive
Soft deletes the strategy from the library
Soft deletes the resource from the library

get.summary: Get all strategies grouped by type
get.description: Path params: clientId (uuid). Returns active strategies grouped into antecedent, reinforcement, regulation.
Path params: clientId (uuid), type (antecedent|reinforcement|regulation). Returns active strategies of that type.
Recent sessions for a client, with therapist and activities.

Path params:
- clientId (uuid, required)
- sessionId (uuid, required)
Returns session with therapist and activities.
Returns client-specific resources plus global resources.

Path params:
- clientId (uuid, required)
Returns client info + parents + support network + communication styles + initial goals.
Fetch homework assignments for a client; filter active by default.

Path params:
- clientId (uuid, required)
Query params:
- status (optional: active|achieved|discontinued|on_hold)
Returns goals with progress.

Path params:
- clientId (uuid, required)
Returns summary counts and today's mood if present.

get.summary: Get staff access code by ID

delete.description: Deactivates the access code so it can no longer be used

get.description: Search parents by name, email, or phone
View mood entries logged by parents for this client
View journal entries logged by parents for this client
Admin-only endpoint. Filter by resourceType, userId, or date range.

get.summary: Get audit history for a specific resource

delete.summary: Remove a therapist from a client

entryDate.description: Entry date (defaults to today if null)
Entry date (defaults to today if null)

completionDate.description: Completion date (defaults to today if null)

accessCode.description: Parent access code provided by staff

generateAccessCode.description: Generate an access code for this therapist

isAdmin.description: Make the generated access code an admin code

accessCode.description: Generated access code (only returned on create)

StrategyCreateRequest.description: Request to create a strategy in the library

global.description: Whether this is a global strategy (defaults to true)
Whether this is a global strategy

StaffAccessCodeCreateRequest.description: Request to create a staff access code

userId.description: User ID to create code for

admin.description: Whether this code grants admin privileges

ResourceCreateRequest.description: Request to create a resource in the library

global.description: Whether this is a global resource (defaults to true)
Whether this is a global resource

uploadedBy.description: Name of user who uploaded this resource

global.description: Whether this is a global strategy
Whether this is a global resource

homeworkWorkedCount.description: Number of homework marked as worked
